content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Hello Bo Li, it's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for your interest in our apartment in Munich. We have carefully considered your offer, and we believe that a rental price of 1,200 Euros per month would be fair. This price takes into account the location, size, and quality of the apartment, as well as our operating expenses. Is this price within your budget and acceptable to you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: It's a little bit more than I was expecting, but I understand the value of the apartment. I am willing to negotiate. Is there any room for negotiation?
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Bo Li. We are always open to finding a mutually beneficial solution. Based on your offer, we are willing to consider a rental price of 1,100 Euros per month. This price still reflects the value of the apartment, but it is more in line with your budget. Is this price acceptable to you, or is there still room for further negotiation?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I think 1,100 Euros per month is a fair price for this apartment. I agree to the price of 1,100 Euros per month. Thank you for your cooperation.
TERMINATE
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for your understanding, Bo Li. We are glad that we could reach an agreement on the rental price. We appreciate your cooperation and look forward to welcoming you as our new tenant. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us. We are here to help.
name: Heinrich Heine
